member.summary: Driver class for a plug-in.

member.summary: Owner control of the plug-in.

member.summary: Name of the plug-in.

member.summary: Boolean for holding whether the plug-in was successful.

member.summary: Creates the Driver class.

member.summary: Initialize the data of the base element.
